How many people are affected by pseudocholinesterase deficiency ?,"Pseudocholinesterase deficiency occurs in 1 in 3,200 to 1 in 5,000 people. It is more common in certain populations, such as the Persian Jewish community and Alaska Natives.",GHR,pseudocholinesterase deficiency
